title: Representations of the compact quantum group $SU_q(N)$ and geometrical quantization
abstract: The method of geometrical quantization of symplectic manifolds is applied to constructing infinite dimensional irreducible unitary representations of the algebra of functions on the compact quantum group $SU_q(2)$. A formulation of the method for the general case $SU_q(n)$ is suggested. (This work is the English version of the article submitted for publication in Algebra Analiz.)
